Real Name: Jason Macendale
Special Powers
SECRET IDENTITY: DEMOGOBLIN, HOBGOBLIN, JACK O'LANTERN: When Jason Macendale would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with a Secret Identity character with a listed name on click #9. This game, when that replacement is KO'd, it scores this character's points and an additional 25 points.
DON'T MAKE DEALS WITH DEMONS - TRUST ME: Opposing characters within 4 squares can't use the Mystics team ability.
MERCENARY ASSASSIN: Sidestep, Stealth.
